page.title: 02THE LOCAL POLICEMAN GREENOCK
page.content: The {local policeman's } duties are to guard, watch and patrol the area. He has to protect life and property and to give help when it is needed. Sometimes he has to warn, charge or even arrest people. The beat policemen patrol the area on foot. There is also 1 {panda car } and 1 {motorbike}.There is a{police {box}in Aberfoyle Road. It was built in 1968. Here the policemen can have their meals and people can go there if they need help. The policeman's{equipment }includes handcuffs, a truncheon, a radio, a notebook and, most important, his warrant card. The {most common}crime is dishonesty. This includes stealing and shoplifting etc. {The least crime occurs in wet, cold {weather}
